ComicInfo.Penciller: Emi Lenox,Greg Hinkle,Owen Gieni,Sloane Leong,Sophie Campbell,Ross Campbell,Jed Dougherty,Ross Campbell,Owen Gieni,Emi Lenox,Sloane Leong,Jed Dougherty,Greg Hinkle
ComicInfo.Summary: The dawn before war. Glory and her allies face inevitable death. With only hours left to live, everyone's final moments are revealed in short stories illustrated by some of the greatest new talents in comics, including OWEN GIENI, GREG HINKLE, SLOANE LEONG, JED DOUGHERTY and a very special crossover with EMI LENOX's EMITOWN!
ComicInfo.Title: War Torn: Part Two: Missing in Action
